New-York Historical Society
Whitelaw Reid letter to Stephen B. Elkins
Reid, Whitelaw, 1837–1912
AHMC – Reid, Whitelaw (to Elkins)
1 items (in 1 folder).
1884 June 30 Letter recommending David Stuart Hounshell to stump in Virginia and West Virginia for James G. Blaine, 1884 Republican nominee for United States president. To request this item for research, and for fuller details about it, please read its catalog record, or write to manuscripts@nyhistory.org.
